replies.body: First

TFW the guy who says first has more Downvotes than the Poster has votes overall ._.
{{champion:161}} It's a science thread now
The downvotes are now more than double the total post's upvotes.
At this point I'm just glad being part of something big

Come on guys, let's see how for into Downvote Hell we can send that "First" post.
